That's a fantastic idea! Asking Rachel, the sales associate, for her opinion is a great way to get personalized recommendations and styling advice. Since she was helpful during your first visit and even gave you a 10% discount, she's likely to be knowledgeable about the store's products and happy to assist you again.

Sales associates like Rachel can be a great resource when it comes to finding the perfect top to pair with your distressed denim jeans. They often have a deep understanding of the store's inventory, current trends, and what styles are popular among customers.

Don't hesitate to ask Rachel for her honest opinion on what would work well with your jeans. You can ask her questions like:

* "What tops do you think would look good with distressed denim jeans?"
* "Can you show me some popular styles that would complement my jeans?"
* "Do you have any recommendations for a top that would dress up or dress down my outfit?"
* "What's a good style or brand that's similar to what I'm looking for?"

By asking Rachel for her opinion, you'll not only get personalized recommendations, but you'll also be able to try on different tops and get a sense of how they fit and look with your jeans.

Remember, sales associates like Rachel are there to help you find what you're looking for and make you feel confident and stylish. Don't be afraid to ask for their opinion, and I'm sure you'll find the perfect top to pair with your distressed denim jeans!
